Tooling
=======

Prettypretty includes the following command line scriptlets that show off its
features:


.. autoprogram:: prettypretty.grid:create_parser()
    :prog: python -m prettypretty.grid
    :groups:


.. autoprogram:: prettypretty.termio:create_parser()
    :prog: python -m prettypretty.termio
    :groups:
